snippet.title: HOTEL BARCELONA Xbox Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Legendary Japanese creators SWERY (Deadly Premonition, D4: Dark Dreams Don't Die) and SUDA51 (No More Heroes, Lollipop Chainsaw) welcome you to HOTEL BARCELONA - a surreal, blood-soaked sidescrolling roguelite.Trapped in a horror hotel built on good times and bad vibes, you must fight, die, repeat, and maybe - just maybe - uncover the truth behind the Seven Slasher Killers who roam the grounds.Coming soon to Xbox.
#idxbox #idatxbox
